name: Advanced Functional Materials Congress
content: The Advanced Functional Materials Congress (AFMC 2020) provides opportunities for researchers, engineers, students, professionals, and business giants to present their research results, breakthrough innovations, discoveries, path-breaking ideas, experiences, products display, and new products launch at a global platform. Call for Abstract The congress invites professional researchers, scientific communities, students and business professionals from all over the world to attend the three-day international conference to be held in Stockholm, Sweden during 23 - 25 March 2020\. 33rd Assembly of AMC will have a series of keynote, invited lectures, comprehensive oral and poster sessions on the following subject areas: 1) Advanced Functional Materials 2) Battery Materials and Technology 3) Ceramics and Dielectric Materials 4) Biological and Bio-compatible Materials 5) Smart Materials 6) Micro and Nano-structured Materials 7) Analytical Methods and Spectroscopy
